bioghist.p: Emile N. Colle was born in 1876 and died in 1969.

scopecontent.p: Pages of clip-books assembled by Emile N. Colle. The pages contain natural history illustrations of mammals, birds, birds eggs, birds nests, fishes, reptiles, insects, lepidoptera, conchology, and crustacea, generally cut from published works. Accompanying the plates is a large encyclopedic typed manuscript of the animal kingdom, which lists principal orders and families, and then presents descriptions of species, arranged alphabetically. The collection also includes two letters from Colle to Stephen Marshall regarding the disposition of the text and plates.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
